name: Lawrence S. HERMAN, D.C., Nachas, Inc., Jason H. Herman, Mitchell Chiropractic Center, and Thomas C. Mitchell, D.C., Petitioners v. HIGHMARK, INC. d/b/a Highmark Blue Cross Blue Shield, and Pennsylvania Blue Shield, Respondents

parties: Lawrence S. HERMAN, D.C., Nachas, Inc., Jason H. Herman, Mitchell Chiropractic Center, and Thomas C. Mitchell, D.C., Petitioners v. HIGHMARK, INC. d/b/a Highmark Blue Cross Blue Shield, and Pennsylvania Blue Shield, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is hereby GRANTED. It is also ordered that the order of the Commonwealth Court is Vacated and the matter is Remanded to the Commonwealth Court for reconsideration in light of Ciamaichelo v. Independence Blue Cross, 589 Pa. 415, 909 A.2d 1211 (2006).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
919 A.2d 187
Lawrence S. HERMAN, D.C., Nachas, Inc., Jason H. Herman, Mitchell Chiropractic Center, and Thomas C. Mitchell, D.C., Petitioners v. HIGHMARK, INC. d/b/a Highmark Blue Cross Blue Shield, and Pennsylvania Blue Shield, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 14, 2007.
